intro_popup.title: Introducing Polygon MANA
intro_popup.content: Polygon MANA will allow you to make transactions much cheaper and faster.{br}You can learn more about Polygon MANA in our {blog_link}, and don't forget you can start managing your coins in our new {account_link}.{br}Click your avatar, select {manage_account} and start conquering the Metaverse.

meta_transaction_failure.body: There was an error sending the meta transaction.{br}Please try again or join our {discord_link} to get support.

contract_account.title: Not supported
contract_account.body: Smart contract wallets don't support meta-transactions.

maintainance.notice: We're currently under maintainance, we'll be back soon!

authorization_step.title: List for Rent
authorization_step.notice_line_one: Before listing your {assetType} for rent you will need to approve the {link} contract so it can operate your {assetType}, exactly like when selling your {assetType}.
authorization_step.notice_line_two: When the renting period is over you will have two options:
authorization_step.notice_line_two_option_one_title: Claim your land back so you can use it
authorization_step.notice_line_two_option_one_text: You will need to send a new transaction and cover its cost
authorization_step.notice_line_two_option_two_title: Listing your land for rent again
authorization_step.confirm: Confirm transaction on your wallet to continue

create_listing_step.title: List for Rent
create_listing_step.periods_tooltip: Select the days you are willing to rent your Land
create_listing_step.dao_fee: 2.5% of the price will go to the DAO

confirmation_step.title: Confirm Listing
confirmation_step.notice_line_one: Review and confirm the price and rent periods you selected.
confirmation_step.notice_line_two: Listing is free of charge, but editing or canceling a listing will require sending a transaction, and you will need to cover its cost.
